info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 5:57PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Elkhart, northwestern Lagrange, eastern Cass and St. Joseph Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Simonton Lake, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Constantine around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Three Rivers and Centreville. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 91 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
